price: Ni ho rero bamwiganira ko se yamaze guhuma biturutse ku ntimba amufitiye, aca ababwira ati: “Nimugende mujanye iyi kanzu yanje; nimwagerayo, muce muyiterera mu maso ya data, azoca asubira kubona ukuri kwamye, hanyuma muzoce mugaruka muzananye n’umuryango wose”.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبُواْ بِقَمِيصِي هَٰذَا فَأَلۡقُوهُ عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِ أَبِي يَأۡتِ بَصِيرٗا وَأۡتُونِي بِأَهۡلِكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

meta.transliteration: idh'habū biqamīṣī hādhā fa-alqūhu ʿalā wajhi abī yati baṣīran watūnī bi-ahlikum ajmaʿīna
